src.xmesh.xface module¶

class src.xmesh.xface.XFace¶

Bases: object

Represents a face object as outlined in an xmf file.

parse(idxs)¶

Concatenates a group of vertex indices into an xmf face tag.

Parameters

idxs (list) – A list of lists of vertex indices.

Returns

An xml Element representing an xml <FACE> tag.

src.xmesh.xmap module¶

class src.xmesh.xmap.WeightMap¶

Bases: object

Default weights for imvu base male avatar.

classmethod lookup(bone)¶

Maps an imvu bone to its body part id.

Parameters

bone (str) – A string representing an imvu bone name.

Returns

An int referring to the bone’s body part id.
